content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the district court in ljubljana the case started on may 29 2014 and ended on december 4 2015 lasting for a total of 1 year 6 months and 5 days the party responsible for paying the costs of the case is not mentioned in the final resolution the value of the goods involved in the case is determined to be 41000 eur the defendant has been ordered by the court to pay 46000 eur for the costs of the procedure as part of the settlement the plaintiff gets to keep a table and three chairs while the defendant gets to keep the remaining items of real estate additionally the plaintiff is required to give the defendant a painting the court made its decision based on specific laws and principles the details of the settlement are confidential and there is no translation available
